name: APEX QR Code Scanner
description:
This Region Plug-in is used to scan QR Codes. If any string has been detected an APEX Item can be set, Dynamic Action can be fired or JavaScript can be executed. To control the QR Code Scanner you can fire events on th QR Code region. The following events are supportet: $("#qrscanner_region").trigger("scannerPause"); => Pause the scanner $("#qrscanner_region").trigger("scannerPlay"); => Restart the scanner from pause $("#qrscanner_region").trigger("resetValue"); => Reset value to rescan the same QR Code if needed.

Short info about "Commercially Supported"

Because you get professional support if I don't have time to support you or if the guidelines in your company require professional support! So we have the best of both worlds and you can choose what you want!
